product_name: DAKINE Descent Bike Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Designed to help you tackle steep singletrack trails, the DAKINE Descent bike shorts have stretchy fabric, a secure fit and articulated knees to ensure that they stay put while you're at top speed. Lightweight nylon fabric includes a rib-knit rear stretch panel and perforated leg panels to provide a perfect fit plus optimal breathability in a variety of conditions. Polyester mesh lining enhances breathability and helps move moisture away from skin. Zippered side pockets provide secure storage; gusseted crotch ensures full freedom of movement. DAKINE Descent bike shorts feature a ratcheting waist adjustment system for a precise fit; interior waistband features grip tape for extra security. Closeout.
short_description: Designed to help you tackle steep singletrack trails, the DAKINE Descent bike shorts have stretchy fabric, a secure fit and articulated knees to ensure that they stay put while you're at top speed.
